Dgame.Math.Pixel



struct Pixel;
A Pixel has coordinates (position) and a color. It defines a basic component for shapes.

Author:
rschuett

Vector2f position;
Coordinates

Color color;
Color. Default is Color.Black (0, 0, 0)

this(ref const Vector2f position, ref const Color col);
CTor

this(ref const Vector2f position);
CTor

const pure nothrow float[3] getPositionData();
Returns position as 3d coordinates. z is 0.0.

const pure nothrow float[4] getColorData();
Returns color components as static float array. The components are converted into OpenGL style, means red, green, blue and alpha are in range of 0.0 .. 1.0

const pure nothrow bool opEquals(ref const Pixel px);
opEquals:
compares two Vertices.
